00027 
00028 
00029 #include <avr/io.h>
00030 
00031 /** Initialize the IO-Ports Direction registers (input, output)*/
00032 void init_port_directions( void )
00033 {
00034         /* Port A: onboard PushButtons, Steering-Header, Gyro selftest IOs */
00035         DDRA=0x00;
00036         /* Port B: SPI, IR-LED PWM out, MOTOR1 and 2 PWM out */
00037         DDRB=0x00 | (1<<5) | (1<<6);
00038         /* Port C: onboard Debug-LEDs, unused onboard bufferd outputs */
00039         DDRC=0xFF;
00040         /* Port D: Motor OK in, second UART (to display), SPI-CS, Motor1,2 directions */
00041         DDRD=0x08;
00042         /* Port E: first UART (debug), Tacho signals, Accelerometer */
00043         DDRE=0x00;
00044         /* Port F: Analog-Digital Converter */
00045         DDRF=0x00;
00046         /* Port G: Display IO and IR-LEDs in */
00047         DDRG=0x00;
00048 }
00049 
00050 /** Initialize the IO-Ports Value registers */
00051 void init_port_values( void )
00052 {
00053         /* LOCK motors */
00054         PORTC = 0xFF;
00055 }
